caption.title: Correlation of LTB-specific antibody responses in DBS eluates and plasma in ETEC-patients.
caption.p: Spearman correlation of LTB-specific antibody responses at day 2 [IgA (A), IgG (B), IgM (C)] and day 30 [IgA (D), IgG (E), IgM (F)] between DBS eluates and plasma of ETEC-patients are shown.
Click here for additional data file.
